column3: Suppress results with low cell counts below this value unless the user has the RIF_NO_SUPPRESSION role
Use the PostGIS Geospatial Database instead of Shape files (0/1).
Name PostGIS Geospatial Database server in the form <host&gt:<&lt>database>
Name of the the Foreign Data Wrapper Server (FDW). '' disables the use of the Foreign Data Wrappers (remote health data source)

Type of the the Foreign Data Wrapper Server (FDW). Currently only oracle_fdw is supported. MySQL, Informix and OBDC (thence SQL Server) could potentially be supported. '' disables the use of the Foreign Data Wrappers (remote health data source)
Connector string for the the Foreign Data Wrapper Server (FDW). Currently only oracle_fdw is supported. '' disables the use of the Foreign Data Wrappers (remote health data source)
Path to RIF files on a Linux system
Path to RIF files on a Windows system
Satscan parameter file, relative to thwe RIf directory. Use Windows path sematics i.e. "\"
Level of Parallelisation. Only supported on Oracle; under development in PoatGres/PostGIS.
